EmailTemplate.description: Reminder to partners about our BW Survey
EmailTemplate.name: 18-0122 Partner Survey Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Needs Your Input on Future Offerings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Help us help you.
We constantly strive to bring you the best partner experience. Help us serve you better by completing this brief survey.
While this survey can be taken anonymously, if you include your contact information we will enter you in a raffle to win a $100 Visa giftcard!*
We will be following up with you on a quarterly basis to ensure you receive the support that you need as we continue to work together to make solar accessible for everyone, everywhere.
Thank you!
- BlueWave Partner Support
*Winners to be announced on XX date, you must complete the survey by XX date to be eligible.
Questions? Call: (888) 817-2703 Email: PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com
